meanings.definition: A two-piece outfit consisting of a sweatshirt and sweatpants, typically worn for exercise or casual wear.
meanings.sent1: She put on her cozy sweatsuit before heading to the gym.
meanings.sent2: I like to relax at home in my comfortable sweatsuit.
meanings.sent3: He tried to impress his date by wearing a fancy sweatsuit to the party.
meanings.sent4: Her bright red sweatsuit stood out in the sea of black workout clothes.
meanings.sent5: The soft fabric of the sweatsuit hugged her body gently.

meanings.definition: To wear a sweatsuit for comfort or warmth.
meanings.sent1: After a long day, she loves to sweatsuit on the couch.
meanings.sent2: During winter, I often sweatsuit to stay cozy.
meanings.sent3: He decided to sweatsuit all day and watch movies.
meanings.sent4: The cat loves to sweatsuit on the heated blanket.
meanings.sent5: They planned to sweatsuit by the fireplace during the storm.
